Product Actions

Product features

Slim fit

This Slim fit jacket features softly structured shoulders, notch lapels and a single breasted fastening with two buttons.

Read more

This Slim fit jacket features softly structured shoulders, notch lapels and a single breasted fastening with two buttons. The chest and waist are tailored for an elegant tapered fit, with slimmer sleeves giving an overall streamlined look. Not too tight, this is our most popular fit and suitable for most shapes and sizes.

View all slim fits

Slim fit

These trousers have a tapered leg with a flat front. The cut has a slightly more modern look than our Classic fit trousers.

Read more

These trousers have a tapered leg with a flat front. The cut is exceptionally smart, with a slightly more modern look than our Classic fit trousers.

The flat front contributes to the contemporary style, with clean lines providing a neater look. Slim fit trousers are our most regular fit - they’re suitable for the majority of shapes and sizes.

View all slim fits

Product details

Product details

  • 100% wool
  • Super 100's yarn
  • Slim fit
  • Jacket: Single breasted two-button fastening and one-button showing
  • Jacket: Working four-button cuff
  • Jacket: Corozo nut buttons and contrast stalk loops under lapel
  • Trousers: Half lined to knee
  • Trousers: Belt loops to fit 4.5 cm belt
  • Waistcoat: Single breasted five-button fastening and five-button showing
  • Dry clean only

"Those of us that need to wear a suit all year round sometimes spend the warmer months suffering through stuffy and, frankly, uncomfortable days. Luckily, we're introducing our End-on-End suits this season, which are designed to look and feel great ALL year round."
